short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert scientific notation to decimal notation at anytime while you browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very easy way to convert the scientific number/notation to decimal number/notation.

Numbers like 123.1435642124e+9 is really confusing and you don't need to search about it. So this extension solve this problem and converts that confusing number to decimal number.
